sense.name: Develop blister
sense.examples: Her feet blistered during the long hike The soldier's feet blistered during the long march.

sense.name: Cause to blister
sense.examples: The tight shoes and perspiration blistered her feet. My running shoes blistered my feet. The discussion has blistered my thinking about the issue

sense.name: scald, verbally or in writing
sense.examples: The Senator blistered the administration in his speech on Friday. The professor scaled the students. Your invectives scorched the community. The editors of the left-leaning paper blistered the new House Speaker
